text: Javier Berasaluce Marquiegui (4 January 1931 – 8 February 2022) was a Spanish footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He played in La Liga with Deportivo Alavés, Real Madrid and Racing de Santander. His career began in 1951 and he retired in 1963. Berasaluce died on 8 February 2022, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish footballers
title: Javier Berasaluce
